channel.title: english on POLOXUE's BLOG

item.title: 100 篇字幕挑战 4
item.description: Transcript from video:) A: Say cheese. B: Cheese. (camera shutter clicks) Now tell me what was in that letter. A: You’re pretty cranky for a princess rodeo clown. B: Missy! A: Caltech wants you to go to school there. B: Really? A: They want to talk to Mom and Dad about it. B: I can’t believe she would hide that from me. A: Whatever. Put your nose back on. (camera shutter clicks)
